pages.title: Mana Generators
pages.text: Mana Generators produce $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el by consuming different resources, that depend on the type of generator./br1With the help of a $(l:e_item_mana_linker)Mana Linker/el the Mana can be transferred to other machines that require it to work.
This version of the mana generator consumes regular furnace fuel to produce $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el./br1It is slow and not very efficient.

This version of the mana generator only consumes items from the $(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity dimension/el. If you have access to this dimension, it is very easy to fuel this generator./br1It is not very efficient, but produces $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el at a much faster rate.

This version of the mana generator is a bit dangerous. It produces $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el by hurting mobs until they are dead. The more mobs it can damage in its range, the more Mana it generates.
